1{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Content operators on clocks and times.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Time
7  ( -- * Operators
8    copsTime,
9
10    -- * Implementations
11    copTimeAdd,
12    copDateForm,
13    copMjd,
14    copTime,
15    copClock,
16    copDayw,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type              as T
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data              as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
23
24
25-- | Content operators on clocks and times.
26copsTime :: (D.CContent c) => [D.Cop c]
27copsTime =
28    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-day")    $ copTimeAdd T.timeAddDay
29    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-week")   $ copTimeAdd T.timeAddWeek
30    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-month")  $ copTimeAdd T.timeAddMonth
31    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "add-year")   $ copTimeAdd T.timeAddYear
32    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "clock")      copClock
33    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "mjd")        copMjd
34    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "time")       copTime
35    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "weekly")     $ copDateForm T.weekly
36    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "monthly")    $ copDateForm T.monthly
37    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "yearly")     $ copDateForm T.yearly
38    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "dayw")       $ copDayw
39    ]
40
41-- | Add day\/week\/month\/year to time.
42--
43--   >>> add-week ( 5 )( 2013-04-18 )
44--   2013-05-23
45--
46--   >>> add-month ( 1 )( 2013-04-18 )
47--   2013-05-18
48--
49copTimeAdd :: (D.CContent c) => (Integer -> O.Map T.Time) -> D.CopCalc c
50copTimeAdd add [D.getIntegral -> Right n, D.getTime -> Right t]
51    = D.putTime $ add n t
52copTimeAdd _ cs = Msg.unexpArg cs ["integer time"]
53
54-- | Convert time to the modified Jurian day.
55--
56--   >>> mjd 2013-04-18
57--   56400
58--
59copMjd :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
60copMjd [(D.getTime -> Right t)] = Right $ D.pInteger $ T.mjdInteger $ T.toMjd t
61copMjd cs = Msg.unexpArg cs ["time"]
62
63-- | Convert format of date.
64--
65--   >>> weekly 2013-04-18
66--   2013-#16-4
67--
68copDateForm :: (D.CContent c) => O.Map T.Date -> D.CopCalc c
69copDateForm f [D.getTime -> Right t] = D.putTime $ T.timeAltDate f t
70copDateForm _ cs = Msg.unexpArg cs ["time"]
71
72-- | Create time from year, month, and day.
73--
74--   >>> time ( 2013 )( 4 )( 18 )
75--   2013-04-18
76--
77copTime :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
78copTime cs0 = arg1 cs0 where
79    arg1         ((D.getIntegral -> Right y) : cs)
80                      = arg2 y cs
81    arg1         _    = bad
82
83    arg2 y       ((D.getIntegral -> Right m) : cs)
84                      = arg3 y m cs
85    arg2 _       _    = bad
86
87    arg3 y m     ((D.getIntegral -> Right d) : cs)
88                      = do date <- T.ymdDate y m d
89                           arg4 date cs
90    arg3 y m     []   = do date <- T.ymdDate y m 1
91                           D.putTime $ T.dTime date
92    arg3 _ _     _    = bad
93
94    arg4 day     ((D.getIntegral -> Right h) : cs)
95                      = arg5 day h cs
96    arg4 day     []   = D.putTime $ T.dTime day
97    arg4 _       _    = bad
98
99    arg5 day h   ((D.getIntegral -> Right m) : cs)
100                      = arg6 day h m cs
101    arg5 day h   []   = D.putTime $ T.dcTime day (T.clockDh 0 h)
102    arg5 _ _     _    = bad
103
104    arg6 day h m [(D.getIntegral -> Right s)]
105                      = D.putTime $ T.dcTime day (T.clockDhms 0 h m s)
106    arg6 day h m []   = D.putTime $ T.dcTime day (T.clockDhm  0 h m)
107    arg6 _ _ _   _    = bad
108
109    bad = Msg.unexpArg cs0 ["year month? day? hour? min? sec?"]
110
111-- | Create clock from day, hour, minute, and second.
112--
113--   >>> clock ( 0 )( 12 )( 45 )( 30 )
114--   |12:45:30|
115--
116copClock :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
117copClock cs0 = arg1 cs0 where
118    arg1       ((D.getIntegral -> Right d) : cs)
119                     = arg2 d cs
120    arg1       []    = D.putClock $ T.clockFromD 0
121    arg1       _     = bad
122
123    arg2 d     ((D.getIntegral -> Right h) : cs)
124                     = arg3 d h cs
125    arg2 d     []    = D.putClock $ T.clockFromD d
126    arg2 _     _     = bad
127
128    arg3 d h   ((D.getIntegral -> Right m) : cs)
129                     = arg4 d h m cs
130    arg3 d h   []    = D.putClock $ T.clockFromDh d h
131    arg3 _ _   _     = bad
132
133    arg4 d h m [(D.getIntegral -> Right s)]
134                     = D.putClock $ T.clockFromDhms d h m s
135    arg4 d h m []    = D.putClock $ T.clockFromDhm  d h m
136    arg4 _ _ _ _     = bad
137
138    bad = Msg.unexpArg cs0 ["day? hour? min? sec?"]
139
140-- | Day of week.
141--
142--   >>> dayw 2013-04-18
143--   4
144--
145copDayw :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
146copDayw [D.getTime -> Right t] = Right $ daywContent $ T.mjdDayw t
147copDayw cs = Msg.unexpArg cs ["time"]
148
149daywContent :: (D.CDec c) => T.Dayw -> c
150daywContent = D.pInt . fromEnum
